channel.title: Consumer Healthcare on FinanClub

item.title: HLN
item.description: score:44 Chances: Haleon has raised its annual organic revenue growth forecast, indicating a positive outlook for demand in essential healthcare products. The company’s focus on essential, over-the-counter respiratory and oral health products has led to growing volumes and consumer spending. Haleon’s partnership with Halodoc in Indonesia to provide mobile clinic services showcases its commitment to improving medical care access.
